text: @RepDanCrenshaw Trump said #coronavirus was their "new hoax" (meaning Democrat hoax) on Feb 28 He downplayed  #CoronavirusPandemic 1st US known Case was Jan 15 Now its Apr 19, (3 Months) there's 742,637 US Cases & 39,201 US Deaths #CoronavirusOutbreak @realDonaldTrump @POTUS @WhiteHouse
